adrFormatAddress: 105 E 29th St, New York, NY 10016, USA

originalText.text: Working with Richard was so easy and simple. Bought a really unique and lovely rug for a client from across the country - Richard was willing to send us the rug as-is to take a look in person, once approved he did all the cleaning and reweaving. It looks perfect, we're so happy. Thank you, Richard!

text.text: Working with Richard was so easy and simple. Bought a really unique and lovely rug for a client from across the country - Richard was willing to send us the rug as-is to take a look in person, once approved he did all the cleaning and reweaving. It looks perfect, we're so happy. Thank you, Richard!

originalText.text: Amazing selection of really unique and beautiful rugs and impeccable service.  We gave Richard some general ideas of what we were looking for when it was time to replace our living room rug and he came up with the perfect option, delivered it personally, helped us arrange it, the pad, and the furniture, and gave us a great price!  Then found us the perfect runners to match. Such a good experience that I've already sent my parents to him for their new rugs!

text.text: Amazing selection of really unique and beautiful rugs and impeccable service. Then found us the perfect runners to match. Such a good experience that I've already sent my parents to him for their new rugs!

originalText.text: Purchasing a rug, especially an expensive one, can be a daunting experience. Is it real, am I being taken for a ride, will it be switched before shipping?  Even with excellent haggling skills, but without some expertise, what are the odds of finding an excellent deal at Istanbul's Grand Bazaar?  (No offense.)  Quality purchases require trusted maintenance so I was on my guard when I handed over to Richard the centerpiece of my studio apt., my silk carpet (purchased over a decade ago in Istanbul) to be cleaned. Not particularly careful while eating my meals at my coffee table, lots of spills did happen & so I was not optimistic that it could be restored. Wrong! Double cleaning & quality procedures brought this masterpiece back to its original luster. This time however I got smart & bought a clear plastic rug runner to protect against inevitable future disasters. Richard Afkari Rugs delivers!

originalText.text:
Richard Afkari’s excellent reputation precedes him and he certainly lives up to it. He is personable, intelligent and determined to deliver customer satisfaction. Whether or not you have an education in the history/ art of rugs and carpets, I highly recommend you pay his impressive showroom a visit.
I was floored by his extensive knowledge and experience from traveling the globe.  He has an impressive collection of rugs and entertained me with the stories behind each of the ones I was interested in. Needless to say, I am beyond satisfied with the piece I brought home.

originalText.text: This place probably sells some of the best vintage handmade Persian rugs you can find in the city. The owner is very knowledgeable and offers great advice on cleaning and maintaining the rugs. I think this is a great place to check out if you want to invest in a rug that can last decades!
